mapper.sql: id, work_name, worktype_id, constructionsite, coveredarea, designstart_time, designstop_time, completion_time, design_id, design_name, description, create_time, create_user_id, last_modify_time, last_modify_user_id, comment_id, status
mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.work_name as name,a.worksketch as worksketch,a.completion_time as overtime, c.worktype_name as type, a.constructionsite as location, a.coveredarea as area, CONCAT(date_format(a.designstart_time,'%Y'),'-',date_format(designstop_time,'%Y')) as designtime,a.description as description,b.image_path as img from works a,workimages b,worktype c where a.id=b.image_id and a.worktype_id =c.id and a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by b.mainfigure

select a.id as id,b.image_path as img,a.work_name as name,c.worktype_name as type,a.completion_time as years from works a,workimages b,worktype c where a.id=b.image_id and a.worktype_id =c.id and b.mainfigure=0 and b.status=1
mapper.insert: insert into works (id, work_name, worktype_id, constructionsite, coveredarea, designstart_time, designstop_time, completion_time, design_id, design_name, description, create_time, create_user_id, last_modify_time, last_modify_user_id, comment_id, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worktypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{constructionsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coveredarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designstartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{designstopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{completionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{designId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into works
id,
work_name,
worktype_id,
constructionsite,
coveredarea,
designstart_time,
designstop_time,
completion_time,
design_id,
design_name,
description,
create_time,
create_user_id,
last_modify_time,
last_modify_user_id,
comment_id,
status,

mapper.update:
update works
work_name = #{workName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
worktype_id = #{worktypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
constructionsite = #{constructionsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coveredarea = #{coveredarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
designstart_time = #{designstartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
designstop_time = #{designstopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
completion_time = #{completionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
design_id = #{designId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
design_name = #{designName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment_id = #{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update works set work_name = #{workName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, worktype_id = #{worktypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, constructionsite = #{constructionsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coveredarea = #{coveredarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, designstart_time = #{designstartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, designstop_time = #{designstopTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, completion_time = #{completionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, design_id = #{designId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, design_name = #{designName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_id = #{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
